Foyer.Body: The Foyer: The grand foyer sets the tone with its dusty chandeliers and faded portraits lining the walls.

Choices.Text: Follow the path away from house.

Grand Hall.Body:
The Grand Hall: Main enterance of the house.
Lined with paintings, filled with history.

Library.Body:
The Library: A vast library filled with dusty tomes and creaky shelves.
These books haven't been touched in ages.

Study.Body:
The Study: A cluttered study with papers strewn across the desk.
Hunting weapons displayed all around the walls.

Conservatory.Body: The Conservatory: A serene space with overgrown foliage and broken glass panes.

Attic.Body: The Attic: A dimly lit space filled with forgotten belongings.

Bedroom.Body:
The Bedroom: A once opulent bedroom now draped in cobwebs.
Toys still line wall by the bed.
Must have been a child's room.

Secret Room.Body:
The Secret Room: Hidden within the depths of a sprawling, centuries-old mansion lies a secret room, its existence known to only a select few.
Accessed through a concealed passage concealed behind a bookcase or beneath a stairwell, the room is a forgotten sanctuary frozen in time.
Its walls, adorned with faded tapestries and portraits, bear witness to the passage of ages,
while cobwebs cling to forgotten treasures and dust dances in the dim light filtering through stained glass windows.
Within this clandestine chamber, whispers of intrigue and mystery linger, hinting at the secrets that lie buried beneath layers of history.

Choices.Text: Play the tape recorder on the table.

Kitchen.Body: The Kitchen: Decrepit and dim. Curious foods laid out.

Dining Hall.Body: The Dining Hall: A grand hall where echoes of past conversations linger.

Garden.Body: The Garden: Overgrown and wild, the garden harbors hidden pathways and forgotten statues.

Cellar.Body: The Cellar: Dark and foreboding, the cellar holds secrets best left undisturbed.

End.Body:
A voice starts:

As I record this, the weight of sorrow hangs heavy upon my heart, for I recount the tale of our
beloved family mansion, now abandoned and left to decay. Once, these halls echoed with laughter
and the warmth of kinship, but now they stand silent, haunted by the ghosts of our past. It was not
a single tragedy that led to our departure, but a culmination of misfortunes: financial ruin,
whispered scandals, and the untimely loss of loved ones. Each brick, each shuttered window bears
witness to the gradual unraveling of our once-glorious estate. And so, with heavy hearts and tear-
stained memories, we bid farewell to the place we once called home, leaving it to crumble into the
annals of time.
